Name: refrigerant R134a production | refrigerant R134a | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals
Description: Several processes exist to produce tetrafluoroethane commercially. The most common are hydrofluorination of trichloroethylene or tetrachloroethylene (=perchlorethylene) and isomerisation/hydroluorination of 1,1,2-trichlor-1,2,2-trifluorethane.
